name: Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj NFT
description: An exclusive digital artwork of Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj, the founder of the Maratha Empire.

name: Maharana Pratap NFT
description: A tribute to Maharana Pratap, the Rajput warrior known for his valiant resistance against the Mughals.

name: Ashoka the Great NFT
description: A historic NFT representing Emperor Ashoka, one of India's greatest rulers and a promoter of Buddhism.

name: Raja Raja Chola NFT
description: A digital artwork of Raja Raja Chola, the great Chola emperor who expanded the Chola dynasty and built the Brihadeeswarar Temple.

name: Krishnadevaraya NFT
description: An NFT honoring Krishnadevaraya, the Vijayanagara Empireâ€™s most celebrated king.

name: Battle of Panipat NFT
description: An intense visual representation of the Third Battle of Panipat, one of the largest fought in Indian history.

name: Battle of Haldighati NFT
description: An NFT depicting the famous Battle of Haldighati, fought between Maharana Pratap and the Mughal forces.

name: Battle of Plassey NFT
description: A digital artwork portraying the historic Battle of Plassey, which marked the beginning of British rule in India.

name: Battle of Buxar NFT
description: An NFT capturing the Battle of Buxar, a decisive battle that consolidated British power in India.

name: Kargil War NFT
description: A tribute to the heroes of the Kargil War, depicting the brave soldiers who fought for India's sovereignty.
